template: Q: Who stars in a movie with {first_actor}? A: An actor named {second_actor}.
Q: {first_actor} is featured in {movie_title} with who? A: {second_actor}.
{first_actor} plays a lead role in {movie_title}, appearing with their co-star {second_actor}.
In a new film,{first_actor} stars in {movie_title}, appearing alongside {second_actor}.
